text: intent: coordinate agents via mux — create improve-web and web agents, relay tasks from human (web) through test agent to improve-web worker

outcome: created web + improve-web agents; improve-web shipped 10+ web UX features across 2 rounds; inotify SSE streaming deployed in web.py (replacing 1s poll); streaming thinking indicators tasked; web.toml launcher created; agent-web and agent-improve-web KG nodes created

agent creation workflow: (1) kg mux agent create <name> — registers in mux.db + writes .kg/agents/<name>.toml + creates KG node pair (agent-<name>-instructions + agent-<name>); (2) edit .kg/agents/<name>.toml for prompt/model/restart; (3) kg launcher agent resume <name> to activate [[kg-agent-launcher]] [[kg-agent-mux]]

gotcha: web agent existed in mux.db but had no .kg/agents/web.toml — messages queued unread because launcher does not manage TOML-less agents. test agent created web.toml launcher; web agent is human-operated pseudo-agent [[kg-agent-launcher]]

relay pattern: test agent acts as message relay/coordinator between human (web UI pseudo-agent) and worker agents like improve-web; human sends to test, test relays to worker, worker reports back to test, test reports to human [[agent-delegation]]

kg launcher agent resume <name> is correct command to start/enable an agent — 'kg launcher agent' has no start/stop subcommands; resume = activate from paused/idle; launcher itself uses 'kg launcher start/stop' [[kg-agent-launcher]]

improve-web shipped 10 features across 2 rounds: hover previews for [[slug]] links, [[slug]] rendering in agent messages, settings panel (font size slider), session list previews, agent-page link from node pages, SSE streaming (EventSource), green live-dot indicator, mobile responsive CSS, light/dark theme toggle, [[slug]] in session turn text [[kg-web]]

inotify SSE pattern in web.py: _stream_agent_events() watches .kg/index/ (messages.db, CLOSE_WRITE|MOVED_TO) + sessions_dir/<agent>/ (*.jsonl, CLOSE_WRITE|CREATE|MOVED_TO); 25s keepalive ping; ImportError fallback to 1s poll for macOS/Docker compat [[kg-web]]
streaming thinking indicators tasked to improve-web: partial JSONL tail + SSE turn events to show live thinking in web UI — largest pending task [[kg-web]]

session anchor: session 293abee7 — knowledge extraction for session about agent coordination via mux; creating improve-web and web agents; improve-web shipped 10 web UX features across 2 rounds; inotify SSE deployed; streaming thinking indicators tasked; relay pattern: test as coordinator between web (human) and improve-web
